solution:
q = int(input())

for i in range(q):
    n, m, k = map(int, input().split())
    if (n < m): n, m = m, n
    if (n % 2 != m % 2):
        k -= 1
        n -= 1
    elif (n % 2 != k % 2):
        k -= 2
        n -= 1
        m -= 1
    print(-1 if k < n else k)
